Setting up The Ecflow Server¶

The functionality of the suite relies on the configuration of the server, which is the central point. For details on the ecflow server capabilities / functionalities check the page

https://ecflow.readthedocs.io/en/5.14.0/glossary.html#term-ecflow_server
